Dealer Inquiry
Thank you for your request. Please accept this message as confirmation of our receipt.
To ensure a prompt turn-around time, please review the following outline of information required for the most common inquiries.
General Information (required for most inquiry types): - VIN - Customer Name - Requester Name (First and Last) - Role at Dealership - Nature of Repair - Mileage - Work Order Number (RO#) If requesting a Rental, please also include: - Number of Rental Days Requested - Daily Rental Rate (excluding taxes and insurance) If Rental request is due to a part on back order, please include: - Part Number - Part Order Number - Date Part was Ordered - Date CBO was Placed - Critical Back Order (CBO) Reference Number - CBO Estimated Time of Arrival (CBO ETA)
If making a Goodwill Request, please include: - Part Number(s) - Labour Time - Labour Rate - Retail estimate - Dealer’s goodwill intentions - Customer Spend at your Dealership - Previous Ownerships - Repair service/maintenance related or manufacturing defect? - Root Cause - Pictures (if applicable) - Service records (if applicable)
If you would like to add any information to your original email, please reply to this message and your case will be updated accordingly.
Your request will be reviewed and replied to within one business day. If your request is missing any required information we will advise you via email and await further clarification.
Have a terrific day!
Your partners at Honda Canada’s Customer Relations team
